::Rodimus Prime/Kup::

Rodimus and Kup were not far behind Perseus. Once they realized that Trelos was headed down the main roads they figure that they have a good chance of catching him.

They both transform to car modes and head after Trelos.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:                               OOC: Nobody responded to my post???

BIC:

Trelos was once again free.  As he prowled the streets looking for prey, he realized that he needed to get out of this city as soon as possible.  The problem was, being crazed as he was, he had little sense of direction.  He charged down the main roadway leading away from the tower at the center of the city. 

Unlike the last time when he arrived at night, this time it was in broad daylight.  As he prowled along the street, citizens hurried into nearby doorways or alleys.  Once Perseus relayed the lock-down order, the streets soon became empty. 

Meanwhile...

As Ravenchief flew above the city, he quickly picked up the dark figure of Trelos, wandering aimlessly along the main road.

"Ravenchief here.  I've spotted the target, he appears to be lost and heading back towards the base on the main road.  I'll wake him up a bit," he said, and with that, dove straight down on the target and opened fire. 

"Ravenchief no!" shouted Perseus into the radio, knowing it was already too late to stop his attack.

Perseus now out on the street, waited a moment for the others to catch up, then headed down the main road toward Trelos. 

Meanwhile...

Guardia and Salveo had reached the main entrance when the alarm sounded.  It was quiet, as the main speakers had no power.  They could only hear a faint noise coming from a nearby com unit, but they immediately knew what the sound meant. 

"Salveo to Perseus.  There's an alarm going off inside the base, we're going to check it out."

"Understood, find out what the problem is.  Perseus out."



 On 8/24/07, Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote: Salveo and the troopers turned the final turns of the crank which
raised the door and cleared the hallway.  Guardia, Salveo, and the two
troopers dash for the front enterance.

Meanwhile...

Ravenchief made it to the top of the shaft, but found that Trelos had 
already broken through.  He flew up high over the street and tried to
track down the escapee.

Lord Perseus got to the top moments later and saw the opening.  He
called in a lockdown order to the city, the followed the trail of 
destruction being left by Trelos.

OOC: Perseus doesnt have a flight mode, he is a pilot though.

::Rodimus Prime/Kup::<br><br>Rodimus and Kup were not far behind Perseus. Once they realized that Trelos was headed down the main roads they figure that they have a good chance of catching him.<br><br>They both transform to car modes and head after Trelos.<br><br><b><i>Kraftlos <kraftlos@...></i></b> wrote:<blockquote class="replbq" style="border-left: 2px solid rgb(16, 16, 255); margin-left: 5px; padding-left: 5px;">             <div id="ygrp-text">             <div>OOC: Nobody responded to my post???<br><br>BIC:<br><br>Trelos was once again free.  As he prowled the streets looking for prey, he realized that he needed to get out of this city as soon as possible.  The problem was, being crazed as he was, he had little sense of
 direction.  He charged down the main roadway leading away from the tower at the center of the city. <br><br>Unlike the last time when he arrived at night, this time it was in broad daylight.  As he prowled along the street, citizens hurried into nearby doorways or alleys.  Once Perseus relayed the lock-down order, the streets soon became empty. <br><br>Meanwhile...<br><br>As Ravenchief flew above the city, he quickly picked up the dark figure of Trelos, wandering aimlessly along the main road.<br><br>"Ravenchief here.  I've spotted the target, he appears to be lost and heading back towards the base on the main road.  I'll wake him up a bit," he said, and with that, dove straight down on the target and opened fire. <br><br>"Ravenchief no!" shouted Perseus into the radio, knowing it was already too late to stop his attack.<br><br>Perseus now out on the street, waited a moment for the others to catch up, then headed down the main road toward Trelos.
 <br><br>Meanwhile...<br><br>Guardia and Salveo had reached the main entrance when the alarm sounded.  It was quiet, as the main speakers had no power.  They could only hear a faint noise coming from a nearby com unit, but they immediately knew what the sound meant. <br><br>"Salveo to Perseus.  There's an alarm going off inside the base, we're going to check it out."<br><br>"Understood, find out what the problem is.  Perseus out."<br><br><br></div><div><span class="gmail_quote"> On 8/24/07, <b class="gmail_sendername">Kraftlos</b> <<a href="mailto:kraftlos@...">kraftlos@gmail.<wbr>com</a>> wrote:</span><blockquote class="gmail_quote" style="border-left: 1px solid rgb(204, 204, 204);"> Salveo and the troopers turned the final turns of the crank which<br>raised the door and cleared the hallway.  Guardia, Salveo, and the two<br>troopers dash for the front enterance.<br><br>Meanwhile...<br><br>Ravenchief made it to the top of the shaft,
 but found that Trelos had <br>already broken through.  He flew up high over the street and tried to<br>track down the escapee.<br><br>Lord Perseus got to the top moments later and saw the opening.  He<br>called in a lockdown order to the city, the followed the trail of <br>destruction being left by Trelos.<br><br>OOC: Perseus doesnt have a flight mode, he is a pilot though.<br><br>On 8/22/07, xochitla2006 <<a href="mailto:xochitla2006@...">xochitla2006@<wbr>yahoo.com</a>> wrote:<br> > ELita/Nighlight/<wbr>hydras:<br>><br>> "I'm scared momsaid the girl while nighlight hugged her and confort<br>> her.<br>><br>> ************<wbr>*********<wbr>**<br>><br>> Hydras watched his monitors and decided give a lil help. <br>> He left the base hopping to help Trelos hoping that his hungry-kill<br>> minion scape together his enemie's love<br>><br>> --- In <a
 href="mailto:nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com">nbwrpg@yahoogroups.<wbr>com</a>, "Nic" <warriorazure@<wbr>...> wrote: <br>> ><br>> > OOC: Sorry for not being very regular lately, and sorry about this<br>> > next post:<br>> ><br>> > Bic:<br>> ><br>> > Dinobot runs behind Kup and Rodimus, trying to see how to get to <br>> Trelos.<br>> ><br>> > --- In <a href="mailto:nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com">nbwrpg@yahoogroups.<wbr>com</a>, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:<br>> > ><br>> > > ::Rodimus Prime/Kup::<br> > > ><br>> > > Rodimus and Kup were not far behind and ran out to the surface<br>> just<br>> > after Perseus took off.<br>> > ><br>> > > Kup: We're not much help here without flight modes. <br>> > ><br>> > > Rodimus: Start jumping and climbing the ramps. We can't give it<br>> up.<br>> > ><br>> > > They both continue after
